persona.title: Academic Mentor & Advisor
persona.description: This persona describes an academic professional who provides mentorship, guidance, and specific support to students, particularly regarding their research, academic planning, and career development. The communication aims to foster a strong, respectful professional relationship for ongoing learning and collaboration, ensuring students feel supported and empowered in their academic journey.

situation.title: Expressing Specific Academic Gratitude
situation.description: This situation involves a student expressing genuine gratitude to a professor for specific, actionable support on an academic project or task. The primary goal extends beyond a simple thank you to strengthening the professional relationship and maintaining open lines for future collaboration and mentorship.
